title: RNG ends Korea's three year stay atop the world
body: The two teams were evenly matched, but RNG’s end game team fighting proved to be too much for the Korean powerhouse. RNG’s victory snaps a three year reign atop the League of Legends world. And for Uzi, who just won his first domestic title a few weeks ago, this title cements his standing in the League of Legends pantheon. He stands above every other ADC in the world.

replies.body: **Uzi IS THE BEST ADC!!!**
RNG 牛逼{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
嘻嘻嘻

SKT did not even has a chance to fight MSI teams, including KZ. They were deleted easily by KT in the 2nd round of the playoffs. SSG lost in the first round btw. Both had a really bad Spring season of 9-9 FYI

Adc is made to be 3x more powerful than all other roles partially due to other roles and items being so designed to empower adc's. And... the best adc wins the tournament. Who would have thought lol. I mean when adc's are 80% of the critical damage (not incidental/meaningless damage like sunfire cape's damage when 2 tanks noodle fight) who would expect such high contribution to the team's total damage by adc's. When burst mages - who used to 1-shot squishies late game - now do MAYBE 3/4 of a squishies's hp and then have no damage left besides pitiful auto attacks and everyone else is playing a full tank or an enchanter focused on empowering adc's... maybe Riot should expect adc's will have record damage numbers?...
RNG牛逼！UZI牛逼！
